thread.title: Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh
thread.title_full: Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh
text:
Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh Coach K is back, and Duke will host Pittsburgh on Saturday. Post to Facebook Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh Coach K is back, and Duke will host Pittsburgh on Saturday.  //usat.ly/2k6j6pH   Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski set to return vs. Pittsburgh Nicole Auerbach , USA TODAY Sports 6:23 p.m. ET Feb. 2, 2017 Duke Blue Devils head coach Mike Krzyzewski call a play during second half against Florida Gators at Madison Square Garden. The Duke Blue Devils defeated the Florida Gators 84-74. (Photo: Noah K. Murray, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Coach K is back. 
Mike Krzyzewski will be back on the sideline Saturday after missing seven games because of back surgery. The Blue Devils (17-5, 5-4) were 4-3 under interim coach Jeff Capel. 
Duke confirmed the return to USA TODAY Sports on Thursday. 
Duke will host Pittsburgh on Saturday. — Duke Basketball (@DukeMBB) February 2, 2017 NEVER MISS OUT Sports Stay in the know and in the zone, 7 days a week, with scores, analysis, and in-depth features and commentary. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Sports NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
